name: tenant info get
description: Gets information about any tenant

name: tenant people profilecardproperty add
description: Adds an additional attribute to the profile card properties

name: tenant people profilecardproperty remove
description: Removes an additional attribute from the profile card properties

name: tenant people profilecardproperty get
description: Retrieves information about a specific profile card property

name: tenant people profilecardproperty set
description: Updates a custom attribute to the profile card property

name: tenant report office365activationsuserdetail
description: Get details about users who have activated Microsoft 365.

name: tenant report office365activationsusercounts
description: Get the count of enabled users with activated Office subscriptions.

name: tenant report office365activationcounts
description: Get the count of Microsoft 365 activations on desktops and devices.

name: tenant security alerts list
description: Gets the security alerts for a tenant

name: tenant serviceannouncement health get
description: This operation provides the health information of a specified service for a tenant

name: tenant serviceannouncement message get
description: Retrieves a specified service update message for the tenant

name: tenant serviceannouncement health list
description: This operation provides the health report of all subscribed services for a tenant

name: tenant serviceannouncement healthissue get
description: Gets a specified service health issue for tenant

name: tenant people profilecardproperty list
description: Lists all profile card properties

name: tenant report activeusercounts
description: Gets the count of daily active users in the reporting period by product.

name: tenant report servicesusercounts
description: Gets the count of users by activity type and service.

name: tenant serviceannouncement healthissue list
description: Gets all service health issues for the tenant

name: tenant serviceannouncement message list
description: Gets all service update messages for the tenant

name: tenant report activeuserdetail
description: Gets details about Microsoft 365 active users

name: util accesstoken get
description: Gets access token for the specified resource

name: viva engage community get
description: Gets information of a Viva Engage community

name: viva engage community add
description: Creates a new community in Viva Engage

name: viva connections app create
description: Creates Viva Connections app

name: viva engage report activitycounts
description: Gets the trends on the amount of VivaEngage activity in your organization by how many messages were posted, read, and liked

name: viva engage report deviceusageusercounts
description: Gets the number of daily users by device type

name: viva engage report activityusercounts
description: Gets the trends on the number of unique users who posted, read, and liked Viva Engage messages

name: viva engage report groupsactivitycounts
description: Gets the number of Viva Engage messages posted, read, and liked in groups

name: viva engage report deviceusagedistributionusercounts
description: Gets the number of users by device type

name: viva engage report groupsactivitygroupcounts
description: Gets the total number of groups that existed and how many included group conversation activity

name: viva engage report activityuserdetail
description: Gets details about Viva Engage activity by user

name: viva engage report groupsactivitydetail
description: Gets details about Viva Engage groups activity by group

name: viva engage report deviceusageuserdetail
description: Gets details about Viva Engage device usage by user

name: viva engage group user add
description: Adds a user to a Viva Engage Group

name: viva engage group list
description: Returns the list of groups in a Viva Engage network or the groups for a specific user

name: viva engage group user remove
description: Removes a user from a Viva Engage group

name: viva engage message add
description: Posts a Viva Engage network message on behalf of the current user

name: viva engage message like set
description: Likes or unlikes a Viva Engage message

name: viva engage message get
description: Returns a Viva Engage message

name: viva engage message list
description: Returns all accessible messages from the user's Viva Engage network

name: viva engage message remove
description: Removes a Viva Engage message

name: viva engage network list
description: Returns a list of networks to which the current user has access

name: viva engage user get
description: Retrieves the current user or searches for a user by ID or e-mail

name: viva engage search
description: Returns a list of messages, users, topics and groups that match the specified query.

name: viva engage user list
description: Returns users from the current network
